timeline.bodyText: Can we add a note to remove that before running the test? currently, it says "no tests were found" if I try to manually run the tests in Android studio without removing the@Ignore  annotation
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.bodyText: it doesn't seem that we are doing anything in the onSystemRequestAnswer implemetation. If so, can we remove this onSystemRequestAnswer & onSystemRequestListener?
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.bodyText: can we load these two strings from strings.xml instead of hardcoding them again here?
